location_on 174 Mulberry St, New York

  1. Dashboards
  2. Real Estate
  3. Property

Description

A cosy and private studio apartment, perfect for those who want to increase their productivity. Accomodation offers easy and fast acces to New York's railway systems (4 minutes) and to the metro stations (10 minutes). Furthermore, there are supermarkets and pharmacies nearby.

Benefits

  • Privacy - the apartment is located on the whole 1st floor of the building.
  • Transport - easy and fast access to public transport facilities.
  • Garden - private outdoor garden.
  • Facilities - shopping facilities in the immediate area (supermarkets, pharmacies, etc.).
